channel.title: CVE Feed for Red Hat -- Red Hat build of Quarkus
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Red Hat -- Red Hat build of Quarkus

item.title: CVE-2023-6841|2024-10-01T20:20:45.372Z -- red%20hat -- red%20hat%20build%20of%20quarkus
item.description: A denial of service vulnerability was found in keycloak where the amount of attributes per object is not limited,an attacker by sending repeated HTTP requests could cause a resource exhaustion when the application send back rows with long attribute values.
